channel.title: How to make teleports on the emote tap [317]
channel.description: the title says all [img]http://D:\server\Homiescape Client\Cody's client release v1\screenshots\evolved 0016.png[/img]

item.title: How to make teleports on the emote tap [317]
item.dc:creator: @cuz cuz
item.description:
@cuz wrote:

Go into client.java and search for “ab=”, remove the “//” infront of the line and compile.

Once you’ve done this you should be able to click on one of the emotes and the button ID will show on your command prompt. Search for the button ID in clickingmost.java or client.java and you should find it.

Once you’ve found it, underneath you should see the start of the GFX, remove it and add the triggerTele.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make teleports on the emote tap [317]
